SysMess.Text: You do not have the required DLC installed for this save data. Loading has been cancelled.
This save data has been altered. Loading has been cancelled.
No response from costume change device. Could not change target's costume.
No response from character tracking device. Could not use Zapping.
There are unsaved entries. Are you sure you want to quit?
Use Zapping to the Delta side?
Use Zapping to the Earthes side?
Withdraw from the Soulscape, and return to the real world. Is this okay?
Welcome. What do you need today?
Oh, welcome. What are you going to do today? Want to make something?
Welcome! I've got some great medicine today!
I received some new inventory the<CR>other day, so please feel free<CR>to take a look.
Oh right, just so you know, I received some new inventory.
Oh, also, I have a wider selection now. Just let me know if you need anything.
Oh, that reminds me, I got a few new things in stock. Take a look if you're interested.
Very well. Feel free to take a look.
Any time! What are you going to buy today?
I see. How many would you like?
Okay! Just tell me how many you want.
It looks like you don't have enough money...
Uh oh. You're short on cash, you know!
Hm, it seems you're low on funds. I can't just give you free stuff.
Oh darn... You're low on money. Sorry!
What are you going to sell?
What are you selling today? I hope it's something interesting.
Have you acquired something interesting? Please show me.
Oh, alright. What are you selling?
Huh, this thing? So how many are you giving me?
This is a very nice item. How many do you wish to sell?
Huh, this right? How many are you selling?
You don't seem to have anything...
...Do you really have something to sell?
Huh? You don't have anything. Just so you know, I won't buy air.
If you need anything, feel free to come back anytime.
Thanks a bunch. Come back again.
Ooooh! You know that password, so I guess you want to see the menu!
What do you wish to buy?
Please select an item to purchase.
Buying something? Here are the items.
Uh, you don't have enough money...
Sorry, you don't seem to have enough money.
You have insufficient funds to purchase that item.
I can't sell it if you don't have the money.
I'm sorry. It looks like you don't have enough money.
What do you wish to sell?
What will you sell to me?
Are you going to sell me something?
Please select an item to sell.
Um, you don't seem to have anything that you can sell.
I'm sorry, but you don't seem to have anything that you can sell.
You don't seem to possess anything that you can sell.
What? You don't have anything that you can sell...
You don't have anything that you can sell, you know?
You don't have any items that can be sold...
You don't seem to have anything that I can buy from you, I apologize.
I look forward to your next visit.
Okay! Let's do our best today.
Very well. Please tell me what you want to make.
Alright! What are we mixing up today?
The Purification Ceremony allows<CR>insertion of Genometrica Crystals to<CR>enhance physical abilities.
"Chat" allows you to talk about specific topics, in order to deepen trust between partners.
When trust deepens, new places to<CR>insert crystals will become available,<CR>so talk as much as possible.
Select the partner to insert crystals into. Select the heroine for now.
Select the place to install the crystal.
Crystals are obtained through<CR>Genometrics, while install points are<CR>opened by chats that deepen trusts.
When you obtain a new crystal, you<CR>should try selecting another partner,<CR>and install it to them.
There's really nothing to talk about...
There's really nothing to talk about...
There's really nothing to talk about...
There's not really anything to talk about...
There's not much to talk about...
I doubt there's anything to talk about.
Nothing to talk about right now.
Hm... There's not much to talk about right now.
In order to maintain the integrity of time, this episode is on standby.
Withdrawing from battle. Is this okay?
Would you like to view the flow of combat?
You can view "Combat" help from the<CR>Encyclopedia. If there is something<CR>you don't understand, check there.
When battle begins, select the Song<CR>Magic to use with the <IM00> button. Use<CR>the directional buttons to change song.
Once you choose a song, your turn will immediately begin. Use the character in<CR>the front line to attack the enemy.
Pressing the directional button<CR>will select targets, while<CR><IM04><IM02><IM06> will perform actions.
The number of actions that can be taken<CR>during a turn is dependent on the<CR>button, so remember them.
The Chain count can be increased by<CR>continuously attacking enemies.
If you attack an enemy before<CR>the Chain gauge disappears, the Chain<CR>will continue to connect.
Use good timing to attack your enemies,<CR>and increase the Chain count!
Once your turn ends, the enemy will<CR>attack. The enemy attacks the heroine,<CR>so your front line will guard them.
While guarding, you can use the<CR><IM00> button to put up a shield. This<CR>will reduce damage the heroine takes.
Guarding requires timing. Please be<CR>aware that you can only put up a<CR>limited number of shields per turn.
Enemy attacks will reduce the<CR>heroine's Barriers, and they are<CR>destroyed after a certain point.
The Barrier has 4 stages, and once all<CR>4 are destroyed, you will get a game<CR>over.
Your actions can also increase Synchro<CR>rate with the heroine, and Harmonics<CR>Level will increase.
When Harmonics Level increases, you<CR>can activate Song Magic, rate of<CR>increase rises, and other benefits.
Increasing the number of attacks in a<CR>chain will increase the gauge more,<CR>so use your actions with good timing.
Your Song Magic has charged up enough. If you activate it now, you can<CR>annihilate all your enemies at once.
Enemy WAVEs that can be defeated by<CR>Song Magic are colored red, so you<CR>will know when to activate.
Except in special battles, you can<CR>only take a limited number of turns,<CR>causing battle to end automatically.
You can select Song Magic from<CR>the command menu. Press <IM19> and<CR>select "Activate Song."
Would you like to view tips for combat advantages?
You can view "Combat" help from the<CR>Encyclopedia. If there is something<CR>you don't understand, check there.
In battle, there are ways to negate enemy actions, or weaken them.
If you repeatedly use actions on the<CR>same enemy, you can Break them. A<CR>broken enemy cannot attack next turn.
Any action can Break enemies, but actions tied to the <IM02> button are especially powerful for this effect.
Some enemies are easier or harder to<CR>Break. Also, certain enemies cannot be<CR>stopped completely by a Break.
You should keep an eye on enemy<CR>actions and remaining HP, and act<CR>accordingly for an advantage.
The Song Magic charge gauge will<CR>receive bonuses from various actions,<CR>such as Breaks and Chain count.
The greatest bonus can be obtained by Breaking all enemies with upcoming turns.
This bonus will not reduce your turns,<CR>instead Song Magic charge will<CR>increase depending on actions remaining.
Breaking enemies with the fewest<CR>number of actions is the most<CR>effective way to take down the enemy.
There are many other action bonuses.<CR>You should find the bonuses that best<CR>match your style.
Once Harmonics Level reaches 2 or higher, the heroine will begin to support you.
The heroine's support is great for<CR>attacking, and also makes it easier to<CR>Break, with other benefits.
The heroine's support depends on<CR>number of chained actions. If you want <CR>more support, raise your Chain count.
Gaining bonuses to increase charge of<CR>Song Magic, is important for gaining<CR>an advantage in combat.
You should find the methods that best suits your preferences while fighting through a number of battles.
You can check combat help at anytime from the Encyclopedia in the menu. Look there if there's something you don't understand.
Returning to title. Is this okay?
